Title: Authorizes owners of itinerant barber shops to obtain barber shop owner's licenses
Summary: Authorizes owners of itinerant barber shops to obtain barber shop owner's licenses provided that they can furnish proof of proper layout and adequate equipment for the shop, and sanitary conditions in the shop and good moral character.
LawCode: Amd ยง438, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to authorizing owners of itinerant barber shops to obtain barber shop owner's licenses
